review: I love the concept of this. Not a huge fan of the results of search when searching for apps but the worst part for me is what I paid for and the quality. When I plug it in I have to mess with the cord over and over just to get it to turn on and sometimes it will just stop working in the middle of a show. Also, the down button of the remote won't work unless you push super hard with your finger. I use it and stick it out because my kids like having all the apps on one device, but I'm definitely disappointed with what I expected granted it's an actual Amazon item.
